column4: I think it was encrypted. There are commands to list volumes right
i dont see dmadm on my pc
there is no such thing as dmadm
did you setup the raid with dmraid or mdadm ?
just check it out, it should be obvious what was used
try to be a little more intuitive than the rest of these blokes around here who are so self absorbed theyre unwilling to help or learn something new once in a while
sorry, please don't tell me what to do, I'm actually quite intrusive and will probe for information
and calling others self absorbed won't get you help from other people
security has nothing to do with what you are saying
sorry, I thought you where asking about recovering a raid array, I have no idea why you are referencing security
no, you asked me to be intrusive, I said I am intrusive meaning when finding out issues to resolve a problem.
your reading confused us both, I didn't use that word, go re-read the message
